data.prayer: Spirit, we know that cultures come and go, even in the state of Central, but the truth of your Word endures generations.
data.verse: Your Word, Lord, is eternal; it stands firm in the heavens.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Central, Singapore
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, for the leaders in the state of Central, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.prayer: Father, for all those you call to look after your flock from the 65,723 believers in Central, please, make them passionate about hearing your Word.
data.verse: Therefore, you shepherds, hear the word of the LORD.

data.prayer: Father, you desire the people in the state of Central who are far from you to hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.prayer: Lord, make the 65,723 believers in Central to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 857,277 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.

data.prayer: Father, put the people who are lonely into families in the state of Central.
data.verse: God sets the lonely in families. He brings out the prisoners with singing, but the rebellious dwell in a sun-scorched land.

data.prayer: Please, teach the 65,723 believers in Central, Singapore how to pray to you and how to listen for your voice. That they might follow you into the good works you have prepared for them.
data.verse: My sheep listen to my voice; I know them, and they follow me.

data.section_summary:
the state of Central, Singapore has a population of 923,000.

We estimate Central has 65,723 people who might know Jesus, 53,693 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 803,584 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 14 neighbors who need Jesus.
